product_name: Oboz Lightning Trail-Running Shoes - Women's - 2011 Closeout
long_description: Quick and responsive, the women's Oboz Lightning trail-running shoes deliver aggressive traction and a cushioned ride for comfort mile after mile. Uppers are constructed out of highly breathable nylon mesh; synthetic leather overlays deliver lightweight support and abrasion protection. Nylon mesh linings wick moisture, dry quickly and further enhance breathability. Deluxe footbeds offer extra cushioning, support and comfort. Dual-density EVA midsoles provide cushioning over long trail runs; hard EVA plates protect against stone bruising and provide additional support. Nylon midfoot shanks offer lateral and torsional stability, increasing surefootedness on varied terrain. High-friction carbon rubber outsoles on the Oboz Lightning trail-running shoes feature asymmetric lugging to optimize braking and propulsion. Closeout.
short_description: Quick and responsive, the women's Oboz Lightning trail-running shoes deliver aggressive traction and a cushioned ride for comfort mile after mile.
